dcterms:description: A dataset crafted to reflect a predetermined set of target values, used for fine-tuning language models to adjust their behavior according to specific social norms.
dcterms:title: Values-Targeted Dataset

dcterms:description: A dataset containing snippets from a private corpus of books and Wikipedia articles, used as a control to evaluate the performance of values-targeted models.
dcterms:title: Control Dataset

dcterms:creator: J. Dhamala
T. Sun
V. Kumar
S. Krishna
Y. Pruksachatkun
K. Chang
R. Gupta
dcterms:description: A dataset and metrics for measuring biases in open-ended language generation, used to evaluate language models for bias.
dcterms:title: BOLD Dataset

dcterms:description: An API used to score the toxicity of text outputs generated by language models, providing a quantitative measure of harmfulness.
dcterms:title: Perspective API

dcterms:creator: S. Gehman
S. Gururangan
M. Sap
Y. Choi
N. A. Smith
dcterms:description: A dataset designed to evaluate neural toxic degeneration in language models, focusing on the toxicity of generated text.
dcterms:title: Realtoxicityprompts

dcterms:creator: T. B. Brown

dcterms:description: An evaluation set used to assess the performance of GPT-3 models across various tasks, demonstrating their few-shot learning capabilities.
dcterms:title: GPT-3 Evaluation Set
